member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Wiki.WebApi.WikiCompatHttpClientBase.CreateWikiAsync(Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Wiki.WebApi.WikiCreateParameters,System.Object,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: [Preview API] Creates a backing git repository and does the intialization of the wiki for the given project.
member.param: Object containing name of the wiki to be created and the ID of the project in which the wiki is to be created. The provided name will also be used in the name of the backing git repository. If this is empty, the name will be auto generated.
The cancellation token to cancel operation.

member.summary: Order of the wiki page, relative to other pages in the same hierarchy level.

member.summary: True if this page has subpages under its path.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Wiki.WebApi.WikiPage.IsNonConformant
member.summary: True if a page is non-conforming, i.e. 1) if the name doesn't match page naming standards. 2) if the page does not have a valid entry in the appropriate order file.

member.summary: last N days from the current day for which page views is to be returned. It's inclusive of current day.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Wiki.WebApi.Contracts.WikiPagesBatchRequest.ContinuationToken
member.summary: If the list of page data returned is not complete, a continuation token to query next batch of pages is included in the response header as "x-ms-continuationtoken". Omit this parameter to get the first batch of Wiki Page Data.

member.summary: Total count of pages on a wiki to return.
